vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παραδειγ-μᾰτίζω,
make an example of, τινα [LXX+2nd c.BC+]; make a show or spectacle of, [NT+1st c.AD+]
__II show by example, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to subject to public disgrace, hold up to contempt
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to subject to public disgrace, hold up to contempt
to make an example of; to expose to ignominy and shame, hold up to contempt Heb. 6:6*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: exponer a la burla de todos, exponer al ridículo público
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (公開羞辱某人) 揭發, 作為例子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (公开羞辱某人) 揭发, 作为例子
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bêu giễu; sỉ nhục công khai; làm một ví dụ công khai. παρά (G3844) + δειγματίζω (G1165)
